title: Crypto: 24-hour cooling-off period included in ad overhaul
description: Crypto bosses could face up to two years' imprisonment if they fail to comply with the new rules.

title: Mind how you use brain data, privacy watchdog warns
description: An increasing number of companies are interested in "neurotech", the information commissioner says.

title: UK to host global AI 'safety measure' summit in autumn
description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak says the UK is "natural place" to lead conversation on mitigating AI risks.
